name: Primal Jam
description:
In Primal Jam, You play Dinosaurs... in space!
Up to 4 dinosaurs will throw down and jam to entertain an Alien Prince. For Groove and Glory ! Pick between moving to dodge or using your musical skills between each beat and be the last one to stand! 3...4... Jaaam!

Default keys :

Keyboard :

H : Fast attack

J : Slow attack 

K : Block

L : Dash

WASD to move.

Supports local play with multiple keyboards / controllers or online via direct connection.

To host games on your PC, open up the port 7777 on your router, then create a game. Give your IP adress to other players so they can join up the jam !

Feel free to leave a comment or reach to us if you find any bug !

Credits : 

Thomas "Dentifrix" Bourdon for Arts

Enrique Pons Del Rey for Music and Sound Effects

Luca Miskic for project management and testing

Adrien Despujol for Game Design and Programming
